document.full_text: a majority of americans say college is unaffordable and not worth its skyrocketing price tag, but graduates say the investment pays off, according to a report published on sunday.
document.title: many say college too pricey but grads say worth it: survey
lines_and_colors: a majority of americans say college is unaffordable and not worth its skyrocketing price tag, but graduates say the investment pays off, according to a report published on sunday.
